articles.description: The final four wickets fell in the first session on the fifth morning as South Zone were bowled out for 234
articles.content: West Zone, on expected lines, completed a facile win over South Zone on the final day in Coimbatore to clinch the Duleep Trophy. Having put themselves on the driver's seat by stumps on the fourth day… [+1447 chars]

articles.title: BCCI announces schedule for elections, Board of Control for Cricket in India | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: As per a seven-page notification, the deadline for the state units to nominate their members was September 24 and the nominations are to be filed on October 11 and 12
articles.content:
The elections will be held in Mumbai on October 18, the day of the BCCI Annual General Meeting © Getty
The Board of Control for Cricket in India's (BCCI) election season has officially set in, with … [+3805 chars]

articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.title: Formula E car unveiled at Durgam Cheruvu Cable Stay Bridge - Telangana Today
articles.description: At 0 to 62 kmph in under 3 seconds, potential top speeds of 280kmph, and hair-raising cornering, the Formula E Gen 2 cars are similar to the Formula 1 cars but run on EV technology.
